title: balotelli

content: Hello, I need $300 via paypal, i will pay you via Bitcoin, LTC, USDT.Thanks.

comments.body: i can send you 300$ paypal as family and friends for 280 in bitcoin

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Although we dont offer paypal we do offer other options to receive USD and many other currencies. BitSwapNow.com offers 850+ crypto pairs for instant cross-chain swaps as well as buying and selling for a wide range of fiat currencies. No sign-up is required and you can start swapping instantly.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on October 05, 2023, 04:00:57 PMQuote from: alterra57 on September 25, 2023, 08:38:41 PMQuote from: balotelli on September 25, 2023, 01:40:43 PMNeed $500 paypal.Are you offering escrow or are you sending first? Which country is your Paypal?Why would a member that got higher rank then you, more merits then you, been here longer then you and got better feedback then you send anything to you first?Sorry I don't want to be rude or trying to troll. But that just don't make sense for me. It takes two to tango orNone of that means anything, merits, posts and account age do not guarantee anything. My conditions are 2, send first or we use escrow, it's up to the OP to decide whether they want to deal with me or not. Plenty of big accounts here that scammed, if you rely on some merit scores you're getting burned.

comments.author: balotelli
comments.body: Hello everyone, I'm back after a period of being in hiding. Please rest assured, I have purchased enough BTC. Just a reminder that I am currently not looking to trade.
